about_the_game:
"Alien Rush" game software is a level - based party game that combines platform - jumping and action - puzzle - solving gameplay. It supports 1 - 4 players to play locally or online. The game will offer a wide variety of level environments, including novel adventure experiences both in the air and under the sea.

[Regarding the Demo Version ]

The demo version includes exciting content such as BOSS battles and city - themed levels. It supports 1 - 4 players to play simultaneously, either locally or online. You can invite your Steam friends to play together online, unlock more levels and tasks, and fully enjoy the fun of the game.

  • The demo version currently supports English and Chinese.In the future, we plan to add localization in multiple languages to the game, including French, German, Spanish, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Russian, and more.

[Brave Team Members Charge Forward]

The demo version provides four characters with different attributes and distinct images. It supports 1 - 4 players to play simultaneously, either locally or online. Players can start an online journey by inviting their Steam friends and embark on an enjoyable adventure together.

[Keep the Mission in Mind and Never Fail ]

Team members not only have to break through the traps and mechanisms in the areas occupied by the Lime Aliens, but also must complete multiple tasks required by the headquarters within the specified time.

[Conquer Every Challenging Level ]

With five distinct environments - city, ocean, base, space, and the planet Lime, the game features a vast number of uniquely designed levels. No two levels are alike.

[Relaxed]

This isn't a game to make you suffer. Besides the enjoyable level - clearing gameplay, you'll also experience:

A plot full of twists and turns

Excitingly presented cut - scenes

[BOSS battles ]

Well - designed BOSS battles

We hope you have a great time playing the game with your family or friends! You are welcome to add the game to your wishlist. Please follow our social media accounts. We will release the latest game updates on the store community and social media platforms.

legal_notice: Developed by Neogasis.  The Neogasis logo are trademarks of Neogasis. All other trademarks are property of their respective owners.
name: Alien Rush Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 / AMD RX 560, 2GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Alien Rush! supports both keyboard and controller, and therefore please choose corresponding controller configuration on Steam setting before starting the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7500K / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580, 4GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Alien Rush! supports both keyboard and controller, and therefore please choose corresponding controller configuration on Steam setting before starting the game.

short_description: "Alien Rush" is a level - challenging party game integrating platform - hopping and action - solving puzzles. It allows 1 to 4 players to play locally or online. Players can utilize rocket jumps and power hammers to surmount various traps set by the Lime invaders.
